item.title: Report X-2024020126
item.description:
Report X-2024020126

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-31
  • City: BROOKLYN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024020126 PACKAGE WAS RETRIEVED FROM A PACKAGE CAR AND PLACED IN SPILL TRAY INSIDE DMP AREA. DURING INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED ONE OF THE FOUR BOTTLES WAS CRACKED. ANOTHER BOTTLE HAD A LOOSE CAP. RESPONDER PROCESSED THROUGH DMP. 2. X-2024020127 PACKAGE WAS RETREIVED FROM A PACKAGE CAR BY RESPONDER AND PLACED IN A SPILL TRAY INSIDE DMP AREA. RESPONDER DISCOVERED TWO OUT OF THE FOUR BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS.

item.title: Report X-2024020003
item.description:
Report X-2024020003

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-07T15:11:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: EAST SYRACUSE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF Freight
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was about to leave the yard but found his lead trailer smelled strongly of alcohol. He opened the door of the trailer and found a drum was leaking. The service center reported that the drum was leaking but were unable to determine the cause of the leak. A cleaning crew was called to the scene and they found a small hole in the drum, but were unable to determine the cause of the hole.
